channel.title: Occasional frameskip/lag spike/sound distortion thing on tram
channel.description:
When I'm on the tram, I get these occasionall split-second "lags" that include audio distortion as well.
It seemed to have trailed off a little, but it seems like I'm getting some occassional split-second frameskips.
I don't really know how to describe it, it's just that while on the tram, about 6 times throughout the game skipped for a split second and the audio static/stopped.
I've never had this problem with any other game.
Anyone else experience this?
[u]EDIT[/u]: Someone else is experiencing this problem as well (not isolated to tram). See 0:46 of this video: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mx9TrETRg9c']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mx9TrETRg9c[/url]

item.title: Occasional frameskip/lag spike/sound distortion thing on tram
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Same, seems like BM is using a different program to process ingame audio because when I used to get stutter in HL1 the voice would continue where it left off, here it just skips over to where it would have been.

Read full topic
item.source: Occasional frameskip/lag spike/sound distortion thing on tram

item.title: Occasional frameskip/lag spike/sound distortion thing on tram
item.dc:creator: OrdosAlpha
item.description:
Yeah, I get these very issues during the tram ride at the start of the game. Once the tram arrives at Sector C the issues cease.

Read full topic
item.source: Occasional frameskip/lag spike/sound distortion thing on tram
